About CA PAM CA Privileged Access Manager is a product that tracks and secures the usage of logins involving access to administrative control or sensitive information. The product uses real-time monitoring, behavioural analytics, session recording and real-time alerts to ensure that credentials are being used by the authorised user and that they are used as they should be according to company policy.
About the Package CA PAM store the Password and User ID. We can get the Password with the help of Alias
=Setup= * This Action pack supports Windows and UNIX Agent. * CA PAM client should be installed on agent OS and should be configure and authenticate with CA PAM server. * Oracle JRE 1.7 or higher version should be installed on agent OS. * Java executable should be set in the PATH environment variable on agent OS. * To run the action on Windows, Power shell 3.0 or higher version should be installed.
=Common Inputs= CA PAM PATH*: Provide the folder path where CA PAM client is installed. E.g C:\cspm\cloakware Alias*: Provide unique Alias which is define in the PAM sever E.g. test2
=Actions= Following actions are supported.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_PAM.PUB.ACTION.GET_CREDENTIAL * Action Description: This action is used to retrieve Password with the help of alias from the CA PAM server
